title: Chapter 4521 - Chapter 4521: 4,520 Chaos-Level Evildoer!
body:
Chapter 4521 - Chapter 4521: 4,520 Chaos-Level Evildoer!

Chapter 4521: 4,520 chaos-level evildoer!

The Justice faction had their own plans!

Of course, all of this was because the EVILDOER faction was too powerful.

Just as the Apocalypse broke out, a huge battle broke out between them and the EVILDOER faction.

And this battle was triggered by the EVILDOER faction.

It was also the elites of the evil sequence faction who attacked them first.

The battle lasted for a long time, and in the end, both sides suffered losses.

However, the Justice Alliance suffered even more losses.

In addition, the Justice Alliance also understood one thing. The reason why the evil sequence faction attacked them right after the Apocalypse broke out.

It was to refine the disciples of their own faction.

That’s right!

After more than 30 billion years of peace, the universe of the evil sequence faction had given birth to a large number of strong disciples.

And these disciples were completely useless in the eyes of the heaven origin creation realm powerhouses of the evil sequence faction.

They might as well let their elites directly devour and upgrade themselves.

But directly devouring and upgrading, how could it be better than dying in battle?

Therefore, when they invaded the justice alliance, their subordinates who died in battle became their rations.

Although their subordinates died in battle, many of them were able to kill their enemies before they died.

The corpses of their enemies were also their rations.

Under such circumstances, it was a huge upgrade for them.

In the universe of the evil sequence faction, a group of Heaven origin creation realm powerhouses was extremely cruel.

Even their own subordinates had to fight to survive!

If the evil sequence faction continued to grow, the Justice Alliance was worried that one day, they might be destroyed!

The birth of the Dragon Palace Alliance was a good thing for them.

As long as they joined forces with the Dragon Palace Alliance, they would have no fear of the evil sequence faction.

…

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

Just as the Justice Alliance began to plan and build the black hole teleportation array…

It was in the middle of Chaos!

This was a strange place in the Chaos!

Black Lightning covered the enormous domain!

To be able to create a special domain in the chaos, it had to be a special treasure ground!

Located at the center of the Lightning, booming sounds could be heard endlessly.

A hundred meter tall creature with a triangular head was bathing in the lightning!

Numerous terrifyingly thick lightning bolts landed on his body and were quickly absorbed!

The power of these lightning bolts could be directly destroyed by an ordinary Great Dao expert!

However, the aura of this creature was constantly increasing!

“Blood sacrifice!”

At this moment, two figures stood at the side!

One of them was wearing a red cloak, and the entire red cloak seemed to be flowing with blood!

His exposed skin was also blood red!

The other figure had countless tentacles that were connected to a head!

They stood at the side and waved their energy. Large amounts of pure blood splattered towards the figure in the center!

The endless blood was quickly absorbed by him.

The wound that was torn by the Lightning quickly healed!

“Boom! Boom! Boom!”

“Ah! Ah! Ah!”

At this moment, along with the rumbling sound, the creature’s eyes shone.

He let out an excited roar!

Along with it, an extremely powerful energy spread out from his body!

“Good!”

“Jie Jie Jie, you’ve broken through, Axe Sword Demon, you’ve finally broken through!”

The figure wearing the bamboo hat emitted light as he said with a Jie Jie!

“Thank you seniors for your help.”

The expert called axe sword demon revealed an excited expression.

“For your breakthrough, we took out the blood of ten universe beings.”

The expert with countless tentacles attached to the head looked at him and said!

“I know that in the next two aeons, all the treasures I obtained will belong to you.”

Axe sword demon said!

His breakthrough couldn’t be achieved without the help of these two people.

In fact, if it wasn’t for the fact that there was another chaos-level existence hidden in the Justice Alliance, he wouldn’t have broken through to the chaos realm!

That was because the other three chaos-level existences in the evil sequence faction wouldn’t allow their faction to give birth to another existence on the same level as them!

“Well, it’s good that you know!”

The expert with countless tentacles connected to his head nodded indifferently.

They were the strongest experts of the evil sequence faction!

“Bzzz!”

“Axe has broken through, right?”

At this moment, another figure suddenly appeared and looked at axe sword demon.

“Senior, I’ve broken through!”

Axe sword demon respectfully replied when he saw the experts that had appeared again.

The three people in front of him were once the controllers of their evil sequence faction.

Although he had already broken through, his heart was still filled with fear.

“Very good. This calamity has erupted, and most of the nearby universes have been cleared out. If we want to find the universe again, it’ll be more troublesome and a waste of time. Axe sword demon has broken through, so let’s completely destroy the people around us!”

The later said.

It was a creature shrouded in black fog.

No, it could also be said that this great being was a mass of black fog.

Above the black fog, a somewhat ferocious face condensed!

And he was one of the supreme beings of the evil sequence camp, an existence that all the great beings of the evil sequence camp feared and feared.

The Great Beings of the evil sequence camp called him the great Lord of Disaster!

“Axe Sword Demon has made a breakthrough. With our strength, it shouldn’t be a big problem for us to destroy the Justice Alliance!”

The figure wearing the bamboo hat said!

“According to the information I’ve received recently, a powerful alliance has been born in the land of origin. Chaos-level experts have been born!”

“In addition, the Justice Alliance is currently in contact with that alliance. It seems like they’re going to build a special teleportation array.”

The Lord of Disaster said!

“We have also heard about it. This is indeed a problem. If the power of the land of origin and the Justice Union were to form an alliance, it would be quite troublesome for us!”

The figure wearing the bamboo hat nodded slightly.

There was a primal chaos realm being born in the land of origin. Naturally, they were the first to know about this news!

Furthermore, according to what they knew, this newly born chaos-level existence was stronger than they had imagined!

It wasn’t simple at all!

It must have been a great opportunity!

The sudden birth of an alliance and a powerful faction was indeed a big problem for the evil sequence faction.

This was also one of the reasons why they allowed their faction to have another chaos-level existence!

“Send someone to investigate. We can’t let them join forces.”

The expert whose head was connected to countless tentacles said indifferently!
